ref: 3340 kulāˊya n. (m. Pañcat.) ʻ woven texture, web, nest ʼ AV. [Prob. with kulya -- and *ghōla -- 2 ← Drav. Tam. kuṭai, Mal. kūṭa, Kan. Tu. gūḍe, Tel. gūḍa ʻ basket ʼ; Tam. kūṭu, Mal. kūḍu, Kan. Tel. Tu. gūḍu ʻ nest ʼ. For sense ʻ nest ʼ NTS xii 265 proposes pejorative ku -- + lāya -- and compares Pers. kunām, Bal. kudām ʻ nest ʼ < *ku -- dāman -- ]
Si. kūḍe ʻ basket ʼ, kūḍuva ʻ nest, cage ʼ ←
